actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Joint resolution designating December 15 of each year as Bill of Rights Day.

summary.text: Designates December 15 of each year as "Bill of Rights Day." Authorizes the President to annually issue a proclamation calling for observance of such day with appropriate activities.

titles.title: Joint resolution designating December 15 of each year as Bill of Rights Day.
